law.catch_line: Office and agent for service of process.

text.section:
Each limited partnership shall designate and continuously maintain in this Commonwealth:
A designated office, which need not be a place of its activity in this Commonwealth; and
A registered office and agent for service of process at that office that comply with KRS 14A.4-010.

Each foreign limited partnership qualified to transact business in the Commonwealth of Kentucky shall designate and continuously maintain in this Commonwealth a registered office and agent for service of process that comply with KRS 14A.4-010.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 101, effective January 1, 2011. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 93, effective July 12, 2006.
